Row.Text: Court Festival
Court Festival
When complete, this project awards 50 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and 50 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism (on Standard speed) based on the number of excess copies of Luxury resources France possesses.
Sumptuous Finery
Likes civilizations that trade Luxury resources to her. Dislikes civilizations that have not made such a trade. Tries to collect as many copies of Luxury resources as possible.
I apologize, but this would be too sudden a change. Perhaps another time?
Thank you.
How unfortunate!
I accept your offer of friendship. And of course, you'll be invited to the next royal wedding.
I extend to you the royal hand in friendship. Will you accept it?
Masquerading as friends was kind of fun, wasn't it? Unfortunately it's time to drop the pretense and get to the business at hand.
You dare attack my sovereign realm? I don't believe even Nostradamus could have predicted this!
I have lived long enough to know when I am defeated. Carry on.
Tempting, but no.
I have sent you a trade delegation with all of the customary gifts : herbs, olives, various cheeses, and baguettes to eat them with, of course.
We received your delegation at the palace. Thank you. The gifts will be treasured.
I don't like the look of what you've been up to. What would your friends think of this information? (Denounces You).
The glory and might of France will not be tarnished by such obvious lies.
You have not lived until you have had our delicacies of food and drink. And I can show you how to use a fork, if you wish.
By all means. It will be a pleasure to see your growing city up close.
I am enamored with architecture. Tell me, does your capital have any triumphant arches, or large metal towers?
I am Catherine, the Queen Mother of France, and I welcome you to the realm. I do so look forward to learning all there is to know about you.
A pleasure, as always.
Would you like to form an alliance?
I do not want to be remembered as a warmonger. Let us put aside our differences.
Absolutely not.
I beg you for the sake of our loved ones, let there be peace between us.
Unfortunately, I simply cannot allow it. For safety, of course.
My military would like permission to pass through your lands. Peacefully, of course.
Oh, very well. You may proceed.
Do you think to intimidate us with force? That will not go well for you, at all.
Catherine is pleased you are trading luxury resources to her.
Catherine is upset that you are hoarding luxury resources she'd rather have herself.
All of my lovers are positively murdering each other to get some of your goods. What fun!
How can my Flying Squadron critique your supposed luxuries if you donâ€™t even send me any?
